Name: Sabir
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Instability: -75%

Optimal Charge Window: -30%
Optimal Charge Rate: -50%

Make a deposit more stable with the Sabir. This accessory monitors and mitigates energy transfer fluctuations that could potentially overload a deposit. Although the optimal charge window will be condensed, this attachment provides additional safety to the operator. A small price to pay for a miner looking to make it home safe and sound.
